sourcesContent:
export const en = {
  // General UI elements
  nextButton: "Next",
  prevButton: "Back",
  submitButton: "Submit Survey",
  requiredFieldsError: "Please fill in all required fields marked with * before continuing.",
  selectPlaceholder: "Please select",
  
  // Progress bar
  startLabel: "Start",
  progressLabel: "% completed",
  
  // Form validation
  validationError: "Please fill in all required fields marked with * before continuing.",
  validationRequired: "This field is required",
  validationEmail: "Please enter a valid email address",
  validationEmailFormat: "Please include an @ sign and domain (example@domain.com)",
  validationEmailLocalLength: "The part before @ is too long (max 64 characters)",
  validationEmailLocalDot: "Email cannot start or end with a dot before @",
  validationEmailConsecutiveDots: "Email cannot have consecutive dots",
  validationEmailDomainLength: "Domain name is too long",
  validationEmailDomainChars: "Domain contains invalid characters",
  validationEmailDomainHyphen: "Domain cannot start or end with hyphen or dot",
  validationEmailTld: "Domain must have a valid extension (e.g., .com, .org)",
  validationMinLength: "Please enter at least ${length} characters",
  validationMaxLength: "Please enter no more than ${length} characters",
  validationPattern: "Please enter a valid format",
  validationMin: "Please enter a value greater than or equal to ${min}",
  validationMax: "Please enter a value less than or equal to ${max}",
  validationGeneric: "Invalid input",
  
  // Results page
  thankYouTitle: "Thank you for your participation!",
  thankYouMessage: "Your responses have been successfully submitted.",
  surveyIdLabel: "Your Survey ID:",
  
  // Tooltips and info messages
  infoIconLabel: "i",
  showInfo: "Show more information",
  hideInfo: "Hide information",
  
  // Survey title
  surveyTitle: "Survey on the Implementation of Dynamic Process Intelligence",
  
  // Language selection screen
  welcomeToSurvey: "Welcome to our Survey",
  pleaseSelectLanguage: "Please select your preferred language:",
  proceedToSurvey: "Start Survey",
  
};
